summary: Police chase an armed criminal in a version of Los Angeles comprised entirely of corporate logos.
cast: Bob Stephenson|Sherman Augustus|Aja Evans|Joel Michaely|Matt Winston|Andrew Kevin Walker|David Fincher|Greg Pruss|Josh Eichenbaum|Jaime Ray Newman|Pauline Moingeon Vallès
director: Directors: François Alaux, Hervé de Crécy | 1 more credit »
title: Logorama
